about_the_game:
STAR SHREDDERS is a story-rich SHMUP that serves as a prologue to an upcoming, more comprehensive version of the game. Play as Clash, a Royterian who leads the Valkyrie force protecting the planet Roytera. As you dive into the heart of an interstellar war, battle formidable foes, and acquire new weaponry, each victory paves the way for the full-scale adventure that awaits. This initial release pays homage to the fast-paced gameplay and engaging stories of the 90’s PS1 era, ensuring that you’re hooked from start to finish!

*ONLY ONE LEVEL IS INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION*



CURRENT FEATURES


  • Smooth and responsive action gameplay.
  • Engaging story that sets the stage for the upcoming full version.
  • Synthwave & Retro Electro music soundtrack.
  • Diverse cast of characters from various backgrounds.
  • 5 strategic weapons to master.
  • Gamepad compatibility for a seamless control experience.
  • Unique enemies and bosses that challenge your combat skills.
  • Well-designed levels with escalating difficulty.
  • Steam Leaderboards to track your ranking against other players.

PLANNED FEATURES FOR FULL VERSION


  • Integration of Steam Stats for detailed gameplay analytics.
  • Steam Achievements to reward your gaming milestones.
  • Steam Cloud support for game data storage.
  • Ring Collection System to acquire new ships and upgrades.
  • Expanded set of 9 meticulously crafted levels.
  • Ship Selection System to choose the best ship for your play style.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
